sentences.en: But I know these egoistic efforts will end up with nothing much.
sentences.cn: 但我知道这些个人主义的努力不会带来什么好结果.

sentences.en: Choose friends must be careful! Pure egoistic, will put on the mask of friendship, but also set a trap to hang you.
sentences.cn: 选择朋友一定要谨慎！地道的自私自利，会戴上友谊的假面具，却又设好陷阱来坑你。
梦是绝对以自我为中心的.

sentences.en: It is not restricted to egoistic goals, much less to economic goals.
sentences.cn: 它并不限于那种自私自利的目标，也不仅仅是经济上的目标。

sentences.en: Over, egoistic man, a penny more than pan big man, the world will let the man be cast into the shade.
sentences.cn: 斤斤计较、自私自利的男人，一个铜板看得比磨盘大的男人，会让男人世界黯然失色。

sentences.en: Such empty egoistic pride – it doesn't stand up to the test of aloneness.
sentences.cn: 这种自我中心的骄傲是如此的空虚,压根就经不起孤独的考验.

sentences.en: The dangers of introspection exist mostly if he is to revel in egoistic thoughts.
sentences.cn: 如果你想要通过自省揭示自私自利的想法，潜藏的危险更大。

sentences.en: They are busy carrying food, but the ant colony and egoistic.
sentences.cn: 它们忙着搬食物，但蚁群里也有自私自利的家伙。

sentences.en: This is probably the only aspect of life where egoistic adults can leave their success, money, freedom and independence behind for just another chance.
sentences.cn: 这一点也许是唯一能让自私自利的成年人抛去成功、金钱、自由以及独立性以求新生。

words.tran_cn: 自私自利的；自我中心的；利已主义的
